text:
*[Bug 18683] R 4.3.3 broken on < 10.10: error: property 'CGContext' not found on object of type 'NSGraphicsContext *'*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18683>

--- Comment #6 from Simon Urbanek (<mailto:simon.urbanek@r-project.org|simon.urbanek@r-project.org>) ---
R-devel r86088 attempts limits the detection of the Sonoma bug to builds
targeting macOS 11 and higher so in theory it should no longer affect ancient
targets, but it is untested as we don't have such systems.

elements.text: [Bug 18683] R 4.3.3 broken on < 10.10: error: property 'CGContext' not found on object of type 'NSGraphicsContext
